body_html: Thank you very much for your feedback. It seems some op consumed more memory than before. If you have time, can you please help figure out which op on your graph used more memory, maybe by simplifying your code and finding out the bottleneck? At the same time on our side, we plan to add better debugging tool for gpu memory allocation and add memory regression tests.

body: Thank you very much for your feedback. It seems some op consumed more memory than before. If you have time, can you please help figure out which op on your graph used more memory, maybe by simplifying your code and finding out the bottleneck? At the same time on our side, we plan to add better debugging tool for gpu memory allocation and add memory regression tests.
